TopicTitle: Ace combat inspire jets: Nosferatu and Fenrir (ADX-02 Morgon)

Articles.Content:
I got bored, and real life jets are LAME, so I made some ace combat jets

Nosferatu:

![1837368-cfa44nosferatu2.jpg](http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/33065/1837368-cfa44nosferatu2.jpg)

![kmwcxoG.png](http://i.imgur.com/kmwcxoG.png)

![VBEW2i0.png](http://i.imgur.com/VBEW2i0.png)

![XUegZxt.png](http://i.imgur.com/XUegZxt.png)

![dSr0eyS.png](http://i.imgur.com/dSr0eyS.png)

Flight characteristics:

Has a strong TWR of 5.81. very limited to fuel as for only 1 fuel tank per turbojet.

wieghts 7.4 tons

duel advance reaction wheels gives some control to post stall situations

A friend describe it as "very fast"

low wingspan gives limited room to weapons.

Fenrir (Base on the morgon):

![latest?cb=20071129063930](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/acecombat/images/9/90/Morgan_normal.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20071129063930)

*Laser gun not included*

![uMb8yjS.png](http://i.imgur.com/uMb8yjS.png)

![rYD0sRC.png](http://i.imgur.com/rYD0sRC.png)

![FdsAg2T.png](http://i.imgur.com/FdsAg2T.png)

![VE90Zh7.png](http://i.imgur.com/VE90Zh7.png)

Flight characteristics:

negative G turns makes me die

Both ships are just over 60 parts.
